queries.query: constructed creature that can change shapes and is vulnerable to fire
queries.variant: constructed monster vulnerable to fire that can transform its shape

queries.query: magical resistance large golem that can fly and walk
queries.variant: large flying golem with magic resistance that can also walk

queries.query: origami golem made of paper that doesn't require food or sleep
queries.variant: paper golem known as origami that doesn't need food or sleep

queries.query: transforming golem with high hit points and slashing attacks
queries.variant: golem that transforms with high hit points and can inflict slashing damage

queries.query: large construct with particular attack forms and no verbal communication
queries.variant: large construct that cannot speak and has specific types of attacks
